title: Jonestown: An American Tragedy
description: In this Dateline classic, Josh Mankiewicz takes an in-depth look at the journalists who exposed the dangers of cult leader Reverend Jim Jones. Originally aired on NBC on July 13, 2018.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
